Comment: I suspect most of people who were pushing that narrative right before the election are happy as a clam with Trump, and the ones who aren’t are embarrassed as hell. I went on and on until I was blue in the face, especially on here telling fellow liberals that it’s a pretty obvious disinformation campaign and not to fall for it, but it didn’t seem to work. As for reasons I stated before, I suspect a lot of those people were never gonna change their mind. My thoughts drift back to my native Michigan and places like some of the suburbs of Detroit where they were likely able to peel off a lot of Arab Americans over the Gaza thing. I’d assume they know a lot of people who are in real danger from ICE right now. Part of me feels bad for them, but part of me doesn’t.
Author: P1xelHunter78
